reviews.sentence: Staff go out of their way to make your stay as easy as possible. All of the staff from managers on were incredibly helpful from offering to get our room ready when we arrived earlier than expected to storing our luggage when we took overnight trips outside of Melbourne. They assisted with arranging transportation and were knowledgeable about food and activities in the area. Be aware that laundry facilities are expensive 9 dollars to wash and dry a load and breakfast buffet is 25 per person.

Disappointing considering the price. The shower bath was not cleaned as it still had hair in it. The cold tap on the bathroom basin was also not cleaned on either day and had black mould pouring out of the base of it. The room service meal was delicious but the trays were still in my room when I returned and documents I requested printed and sent to my room were not delivered. The desk staff said they called my room but I was not there. Of course not I had gone to conference and it was not followed up by a mobile phone call or note left in my room. Overall for a room I paid over 300 per night for I am very disappointed.

Birthday vacation. Location staff and view from room. The location of the hotel was within easy walking distance to The Crown and other sites. Our room had a view to the river which was lovely. We did not dine at the facility so could not fairly rate food dining and with no n. a option just went with 3.
Only adequate. It was reasonable for the price. A short walk to cafes and shops. The room was adequate but nothing fancy.

I have stayed with Oaks on Market twice before so overall I am happy with the service the Hotel. The free wifi of 30 minutes was very poor and should of been unlimited There was no dishcloth for washing up the plates. cups etc so had to use a teatowel.

A friendly and professional facility that makes a Melbourne stop over a pleasure. The front desk staff were excellent. As were the room service staff. The breakfast was not as good as other places. e g. no muesli.

Dirty uncomfortable and rude staff. not a lotno extra pillows only had one each. shower taps and waiting for hot water were ridiculous. toilet seat old and dirty staff were rude and miserable breakfast in the resturant was very average. burnt bacon and dirty plates with dried egg all over them. when i told the chef he just gave me a dirty look.

Close to South Gate. Over looked new development. Room not ready. Had to follow up for kitchen goods forks plates etc no blankets. Room service high quality. Staff on desk could have been friendlier they did not understand travelling with children scenario. Location good but no views. Second bedroom came off dining and living room so noisy if entertaining. I wonder if less attention is given to Expedia customers. This is the first time I have used Expedia.

Not worth the money. Very insecure room charging system. I liked location of the hotel. It was walking distance of city attractions shopping malls Yara river etc. The view from the room was stunning. Breakfast was also very good. The staff. When I was checking in the girl that was working that day embarrassed me telling me that my credit card is not credit card and that they can not accept it because it is refused. She tried several times to use my credit card but she was confused and it seemed that she did not know how to use the POS machine. She was persistence telling me that my card is refused and that I should give the hotel my family members card number so that they can charge for their card my family was 18 0 km away. While she was doing that to me the line of the waiting guests was behind me. In the end I told her that I want to speak with the manager because my credit card was CREDIT card I showed her my booking confirmation I booked the hotel with the very same card. Finally she tried to write my card numbers manually and it finally worked. She did not even apologize. Very rude and very unprofesionalAlso when I was checking out I was in hurry taxi was waiting from me outside and I was waiting 15 minutes for someone to serve me on the reception. They told me there were some extra charges on my room number and that I had a drink in a bar on the second day of my stay. They wanted to charge me 30. The truth is that I was never in the hotel bar and I was never ordering anything from the bar in my room. I think the reason for that is very insecure system in the hotel where is enough to say your room number for everything but they do not actually require you showing them proof of your room number. I guess someone had a drinks in hotel bar and told my room number for charging. I still do not know if hotel is going to charge me for that but if they do I am going to sue them and request for security camera video tape of the day when I was apparently in the bar having drinks. The elevators are very slow and do not like the fact that hotel room cleaners are using guests lift. It takes forever to get down or up.

Location and View equals quality comfort. My second lovely stay at Oaks. No point in taking a Citybreak without a view so top points there. Also appreciated spacious comfort a chilly fridge and a bath with steaming water. Bar and restaurant on site is also a plusMy one tip is to transform the lukewarm relaxation pool into a hot tub spaFriendly and acomodating staff. Keep up the happy effort. As above Great location for shopping dining sight seeing walking to Arts centre and gardens. As above.

Very convenient and nice place and great service. I would love to see complimentary bottled water and Breakfast every now and then will help as well. I am planning to have a family get together in Melbourne and would love to use Oaks on Market if I am given the right deal.
Great conference venue with delicious selection of food and teas.

Great Place to stay. The staff are very friendly and helpful that is all staff from the front desk to the waiters and Restaurant staff. I have found it to be a central place to be in Melbourne easy to get around on the trams buses and train. Nice rooms very clean and a variety depending on how many are staying.

Excellent Hotel. My friend and I stayed here while we attended the Australian Open. Reading other reviews I think some rooms have been refurbished and others not. Our room was spacious clean and looked fresh and there ’s a well equipped kitchenette. The beds were amazingly comfortable and we slept well. The bathroom had a shower over the bath which was n’t easy to get into but my own fault for not reading the room information when I booked. All the staff we dealt with were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is close to shops restaurants the riverside and within walking distance for cricket tennis stadiums etc. A lovely hotel that I would return to and recommend.

Great. Perfect place to stay in the centre of Melbourne easy to get around with being close to public transport and within walking distance to the casino. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Meals in the dining room were very good and drinks in the bar were good. Thankyou for a lovely stay.
Great food and hotel services. Bar is lovely with a great selection and bar food was really good.
Great service beautiful views. Definitely get the Buffet breakfast great value and so much yo choose from.
Hotel was clean and loved the buffet breakfast.

Worth the stay. Friendly staff willing to go the extra mile. Location good. Restaurant and Bar live music. jhapy hour all had to the experienceClose to public transport also an easy walk into the heart of Melbourne.
